rows.label: qst105406_msg0002
rows.name:
You must have toiled a great deal
to locate all four treasures!

rows.label: qst105406_msg0003
rows.name: Heh... All in a day's work, I guess?

rows.label: qst105406_msg0004
rows.name:
Rex, I hereby anoint
you...Salvager Supreme!

rows.label: qst105406_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, forgive me. I acknowledge it
is a somewhat old-fashioned title
for a youngster such as you.

rows.label: qst105406_msg0007
rows.name:
No no, I like it! Really!
It's got a nice ring to it!

rows.label: qst105406_msg0008
rows.name:
Salvager Supreme... A
salvager among salvagers...

rows.label: qst105406_msg0010
rows.name:
It is I who should be
thanking you, Rex, for
fulfilling an old man's dream.

rows.label: qst105406_msg0011
rows.name:
It is not just the title you have earned,
but my deepest respect. It is only fitting
that you receive an ample reward.

rows.label: qst105406_msg0101
rows.name:
I see you've gathered all
four treasures. Would you
mind letting me speak to Rex?
